name: Pepe The Frogger
description:
Pepe The Frogger is a game, based on the classic and well known game Frogger.
It was made for submission to the 2021 Games Academy Game Jam

https://itch.io/jam/ga-remote-jam-2021/entries


Credits:
Tim - 2D-Art, Game and Sound Design
Benji - Programming
Philip - Game and Level Design
Forky - 3D Art
